channel.title: A bit of help
channel.description: 1.) The death animation for ice strykwyrms is 12793 but it turns out glitchy how do i fix? 2.) How do I make it so when u click in the npc id 9462 the npc turns into 9463? 3.) How do I made the strykwryms to have a block animation and a attack animation? block animation is 12792 If possible, can you explain in detail what the codes do because I hate it when people give me a code without telling me what it does...
